com.ooyala.android.configuration

Class ExoConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ooyala.android.configuration.ExoConfiguration

  • public class ExoConfiguration
extends java.lang.Object
    A read-only configuration of ExoPlayer functionality in the OoyalaPlayer.
    See Also:
    ExoConfiguration.Builder
